Title: Luminark of Hysh
Legend: The Luminark of Hysh is a devastating arcane war machine, capable of focusing light through its aetherquartz optics in order to unleash a beam of soulfire that vaporises everything in its path.
Intro: A Luminark of Hysh is armed with a Searing Beam of Light and Arcane Tools

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Warhorses attack with their Steel-shod Hooves.

Rules.Name: Searing Beam Of Light
Rules.Fluff: As interlocking lenses of aetherquartz click into place, a beam of blinding white light burns forth to immolate all before it.
Rules.Rule: Searing Beam of Light: Do not use the attack sequence for an attack made with Searing Beam of Light. Instead, pick 1 point on the battlefield within range ofthe shooting model that is visible to it and draw a straight line between that point and the closest point on the shooting model’s base. Roll a dice for each unit that has any models passed across by that line. For each roll of 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

Rules.Name: Aura Of Protection
Rules.Fluff: Luminarks of Hysh are surrounded by a protective magical aura.
Rules.Rule: Aura of Protection: Friendly CITIES OF SIGMAR HUMAN units have a ward of 6+ while they are wholly within 9" of any friendly units with this ability.
